Display interface
[kernel] 

 - display_driver interface:
　　　　set_contrast:　　　set contrast 
　　　　　　range of contrast:　　0~255 
　　　　　　a simple test method:	echo 100 > /sys/class/display/display0/contrast 
　　　　get_contrast:　　　get contrast 
　　　　　　a simple test method:　cat /sys/class/display/display0/contrast
frambuffer interface
static struct fb_ops uc1698fb_ops = {
        .owner          = THIS_MODULE,
        .fb_write               = uc1698fb_write,
        .fb_fillrect    = uc1698fb_fillrect,
        .fb_copyarea    = uc1698fb_copyarea,
        .fb_imageblit   = uc1698fb_imageblit,
        .fb_check_var   = uc1698fb_check_var,
};
